title: 115.425 NONINGESTED SOURCES; PHOSPHORUS REDUCTION GOAL.
text: The state goal for reducing phosphorus from noningested sources entering municipal wastewater treatment systems is at least a 50 percent reduction based on the timeline for reduction developed by the commissioner under Laws 2003, chapter 128, article 1, section 166, and a reasonable estimate of the amount of phosphorus from noningested sources entering municipal wastewater treatment systems in calendar year 2003.
